FuncDef:
The prepaid-profile command run in the system view creates a prepaid service template or displays the prepaid service template view.
The undo prepaid-profile command deletes a prepaid service template.
By default, no prepaid service template is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a prepaid service template.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A prepaid service template contains prepaid service parameters. Before a device provides prepaid services, it binds a service template to a prepaid service template and charges users based on the parameters defined in the prepaid service template.
Configuration Impact
If no prepaid service template is configured, running the prepaid-profile command creates one. If a prepaid service template is configured, running the prepaid-profile command displays the prepaid service template view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
